recipe.title: Karo Classic Pecan Pie
ingredients: 1 cup Karo light or dark corn syrup
1 teaspoon Spice Islands Pure Vanilla Extract
1 (9-inch) unbaked or frozen deep-dish pie crust
instructions: In a mixing bowl, mix corn syrup, eggs, sugar, butter, and vanilla using a spoon. Stir in pecans. Pour filling into pie crust.
Bake on center rack of oven until center reaches 200°F and springs back when tapped lightly, about 55 to 70 minutes.
